citations.narrative:
There are open bags of feed in the food storage room for the sheep, horse, and deer. Open bags of feed can encourage
pests problems in food storage areas. Supplies of food and bedding must be stored in a manner that adequately protects
supplies from spoilage, molding, or contamination from pests. Correct by April 28, 2023.
This inspection was conducted with an authorized person and the exit interview was conducted with a facility
representative.
n

narrative:
3.125(c) 
   
Facilities, general. 
There are open bags of feed in the food storage room for the sheep, horse, and deer. Open bags of feed can encourage 
pests problems in food storage areas. Supplies of food and bedding must be stored in a manner that adequately protects 
supplies from spoilage, molding, or contamination from pests. Correct by April 28, 2023. 
 
This inspection was conducted with an authorized person and the exit interview was conducted with a facility 
representative. 
 
 n
